text: Tā [fǎlǎo] shuō:“Zài wǒ zhǔnxǔ nǐmen zhīqián, nǐmen gǎn xiāngxìn tā [mù sà] ma? Tā yīdìng shì nǐmen de shǒulǐng, yīdìng shì tā jiàoshòu nǐmen móshù de. Wǒ yīdìng yào jiāocuò kǎn qù nǐmen de shǒujiǎo, wǒ yīdìng yào bǎ nǐmen dīng sǐ zài yē zǎo shùgàn shàng, nà shí nǐmen jiù zhīdào wǒmen zhōng shéi de xíngfá zuì yánlì, zuì chíjiǔ.”
